title: Chef De Piece, "La Demande en Marriage", ca. 1795
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave
inscribed: Partial stamp at bottom; "..pierre et Com...Nantes Bon...nt D57" within parallel lines, a wavy line on red background, and "JP" withing a box (last mark very smudged).
provenance:
Formerly in the collection of Elinor Merrell where it was no 31 on her list of chefs de piece.
Empreinte at Musée des Arts decoratif in Paris
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 49.5 x 71 cm (19 1/2 x 27 15/16 in.)
description: Design in red on white ground showing parts of several vignettes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chef De Piece, "La Demande en Marriage", ca. 1795.
ca. 1795. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave. Gift of Cora Ginsburg. 1994-80-13.
